ELUSIVE.NAME: Elusive
ELUSIVE.DESC: When this is targeted by an attack, negate the attack and remove Elusive. Expires at the start of owner's turn.

FORTIFY.NAME: Fortified
FORTIFY.DESC: This takes 50% reduced damage until the start of [OWNER]'s turn.

INCOHERENT.NAME: Incoherent
INCOHERENT.DESC: This cannot gain Poise until the end of [OWNER]'s turn.

PARAPSYCH.NAME: Parapsych
PARAPSYCH.DESC: At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, this argument loses [STACKS] resolve and reduces Parapsych by 1.

RENEW.NAME: Renew
RENEW.DESC: At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, this argument restores [STACKS] resolve and reduces Renew by 1.

RESONANCE.NAME: Resonance
RESONANCE.DESC: Whenever any other status effect is applied to this argument, apply that effect to ALL other arguments with Resonance and remove Resonance from ALL arguments.

SILENCE.NAME: Silence
SILENCE.DESC: This argument's effects are disabled until the end of [OWNER]'s turn.

UNSTABLE.NAME: Unstable
UNSTABLE.DESC: At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, destroy this if it is a support argument, otherwise halve current resolve (rounded up).

UNTOUCHABLE.NAME: Untouchable
UNTOUCHABLE.DESC: This cannot be targeted, damaged or destroyed until the start of [OWNER]'s turn.

VULNERABLE.NAME: Vulnerable
VULNERABLE.DESC: This takes 50% increased damage until the start of [OWNER]'s turn.
